title: [K-12] Knowledge Integration in Architectural Education: Problem-Based Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Architectural Design Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended learning environment that combines digital tools with real-world case studies. Students undertake architectural projects to address urban social issues, integrating theoretical research with practical application.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real urban problems to derive architectural design concepts.
Learners can develop a systematic process for integrating research findings into architectural design.
Learners can present holistic solutions that combine theoretical knowledge and practical skills through interdisciplinary team projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
